content: i have made all the designs of my norwegian wonderland blanket in hexagon shape too they were available for free during the knitterknotter cal in 2024 and recently i had put them offline after many questions about the availability i ve decided to put them online again they are available now in one ebook with some more hexagon designs in it i hope you will enjoy them and make some gorgeous blankets or cushions with them or mix them with all the beautiful knitterknotter hexagon designs
